page_content:
**Relevant Ghanaian policies to support and enhance climate action.**

- [National Climate Change Policy (NCCP)](https://www.climate-laws.org/geographies/ghana/policies/national-climate-change-policy-nccp#:~:text=The%20NCCP%27s%20emphasis%20is%20on,dedicated%20climate%20change%20research%20centre.) -  has been developed to provide a clear pathway to deal with emerging climate change-related challenges.

- [Climate Change Master Plan](https://www.weadapt.org/sites/weadapt.org/files/ghana_national_climate_change_master_plan_2015_2020.pdf) - developed to deal with the sectoral implementation of climate actions.

- [National Climate change and Green Economy Learning Strategy](https://www.uncclearn.org/country-projects/ghana/) -  has also been developed to operationalise the capacity building component of the Master Plan.
